name: IKIGAI TECHNOLOGIES PTE. LTD
description: Provider of a range of professional technology consulting services intended for fast-growing industries. The company offers technology consulting for different sectors like aerospace, digital services, entertainment, finance, fintech, MedTech and travel, enabling clients to obtain the perfect balance between business operations and technical efficiency.
